articles.author: Orkhan Taghizade
articles.title: The Great Reset: By 2030, Nobody Will Own Anything – A World of Renting and Restricted Lands
articles.description: I predict that by 2030, economic instability, climate crises, and global shifts will lead to a world where personal ownership disappears. People will only rent and live in controlled, small areas as resources are strictly allocated.

articles.author: Orkhan Taghizade
articles.title: The New World Order: A World Without Borders and National Governments
articles.description: By 2035, countries may no longer exist as independent entities. A unified global authority will take control, making national leaders irrelevant. Citizens will receive a basic monthly income—if they comply with the system.
